source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video starts with a close-up, overhead shot of several items on a corkboard. A blue sticky note labeled "BUTCHER" is positioned in the top left, with a silver game piece to its right in the top center. A red string extends from a pushpin on the "BUTCHER" note down toward the center of the frame. The camera then tilts down, following the red string. As it moves, the initial items shift toward the top of the frame and out of view, revealing a second blue sticky note labeled "BUTCHER'S FRIEND" that becomes the new central subject, held by a red pushpin. A portion of a yellow note remains visible in the bottom left throughout the shot.
